name: VS WHITTY KADE ENGINE FOR MOBILE AND CHROMEBOOK
name_original: VS WHITTY KADE ENGINE FOR MOBILE AND CHROMEBOOK
description:
IF YOU ARE THE CREATOR OF THIS MOD YOU HAVE ALL RIGHTS TO TAKE IT DOWN I AM ONLY PORTING FOR PEOPLE WHO CANT NORMMALY ACCESS IT

REPLACES BOPEEBO FRESH AND MONSTER

I WOULD LIKE TO THANK
https://peppymods.itch.io/
AND https://sniper-gamingwastaken.itch.io/ for the help with this port 

FNF FONED IN https://phykro.itch.io/fonedin  

FNF https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

VS WHITTY MOD https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/14457

Controls (In Menus):

  • Navigate Up = Swipe Down
  • Navigate Down = Swipe Up
  • Change Difficulty = Swipe Right
  • Go Back = Swipe Left
  • Enter/Select = Tap

Controls (In Game):

  • Touch the arrow keys on your side as notes reach the judgement line
    • You can also touch anywhere in the same column if it's easier
  • Tap the top-left corner to pause the game
